tasks.install: corepack enable && (deno task install:base --immutable & deno task install:client --immutable)
tasks.install:force: deno task install:base & deno task install:client
tasks.start: deno task start:server & deno task start:client
tasks.start:build: deno task start:server:build & deno task start:client
tasks.check-storybook: cd ./app/client && yarn run storybook:build && yarn run storybook:test
